rules.name: shadowCraftingGeneration
rules.description: Introduce a crafting recipe to create new Shadow Items
extras: combine any item stack and a EnderChest to generate a new shadow stack
the operation will consume 1 item from each component
WARNING: do not move the items with SHIFT
WARNING: do not close the GUI with a shadow stack in the crafting grid

rules.name: shadowItemInventoryFragilityFix
rules.description: Prevent Unlinking Shadow Items on base inventory movements

rules.name: shadowItemMode
extras: UNLINK -> default vanilla ( will also disable the mod )
PERSIST -> shadow items will survive unloading
VANISH -> shadow items will disappear if unloaded

rules.name: shadowItemPreventCombine
rules.description: Prevent Merging any Shadow Item on base inventory movements

rules.name: shadowItemTooltip
rules.description: Show Shadow Items Id in Item Names

rules.name: shadowItemTransferFragilityFix
rules.description: Prevent Unlinking Shadow Items on hopper-dropper item transfers

rules.name: shadowItemUpdateFix
rules.description: Shadow Items will produce inventory updates

rules.name: shadowItemUseFix
rules.description: Prevents desync between client and server when using a fast refilling shadow stack

rules.name: shadowSuppressionGeneration
rules.description: Reintroduce pre 1.19 shadow item generation by update suppression
extras: DISCLAIMER: this will not reintroduce old update suppression
